content: Starting with our financial results, for the third quarter, we recorded net income available to shareholders of $6.3 million or 0.09 per diluted share, FFO of $15.3 million or $0.21 per diluted share and core FFO of $18.9 million or $0.26 per diluted share. For the third quarter, CRE revenues increased by 5% or $2.2 million over the prior year quarter to $46.2 million. Our Materials & Construction segment posted an operating profit of $1.8 million for the third quarter compared to an operating loss of $300,000 in the same period last year.
